title: 119: Hope or Nope: Which 0-2 teams still have a chance?
itunes:title: 119: Hope or Nope: Which 0-2 teams still have a chance?
description:
Former NFL scouts Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks review Carson Wentz’s performance on Monday Night Football against the Bears as well as all of the week 2 action. The guys then play a game called “Hope or Nope” that decides which teams can bounce back from 0-2.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
